sect2.title: Show Layer Mask
sect2.para: The Show Layer Mask command lets you see the layer mask better by turning the image invisible. When you click on the menu entry, a check is displayed next to it and the layer mask's thumbnail in the Layers Dialog is shown with a green border. The layer itself is not modified; you can turn it visible again later.

listitem.para:
You can access this command from the image menubar through
Layer Mask Show Layer Mask ,
or by holding down the Alt key (CtrlAlt on some systems) and single-clicking on the layer mask's thumbnail in the Layers Dialog.

You can undo this action by unchecking the menu entry in the
Layer Mask
submenu or by Alt-clicking (or
CtrlAlt -clicking) again on the layer mask's thumbnail.
